ProductInfo.Features:
H.264 video compression, Pentaplex - record, live, playback, backup, and remote access. 2TB HDD pre-installed.
32-channel, 960 FPS, 960H / D1 Real-time Recording & Playback, VGA/HDMI dual output
Streaming live video on tablets or mobile phones (iPhone, Android, Blackberry, Windows supported)
Mac OS fully remote access and control supported .
Internet Explorer/Firefox / Chrome / Safari: Remote setup, monitoring, backup, alarm notification, remote software upgrade, multiple DVR cosolidation, system configuration
ProductInfo.Name: Aposonic A-S3216T3 Professional 32-Channel H.264 Video Compression Full 960H / D1 Real-Time Recording CCTV Surveillance Standalone DVR with 2TB HDD / HDMI Output, Mac Ready
